title: Aaron Rodgers, MLB, Baker Mayfield, Zion Williamson
itunes:title: Aaron Rodgers, MLB, Baker Mayfield, Zion Williamson
description:
Colin talks about Aaron Rodgers protecting his legacy by playing it safe, why he is for the MLB players over the owners, why he believes Baker Mayfield isn't as talented as some people think, and why the NBA is trying to get Zion Williamson into the playoffs. Guests include Peter Schrager, Ryan Hollins, Michael Vick, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
